activities: Wilson Learning provides online learning and assessment services to the employees ("Participants") of companies or organizations ("Employers"). Participants may request feedback from others ("Respondents") for the fulfillment of assessment services. Personally identifiable inforamtion (Participant's name and e-mail address) is provided to us by Employers for registration purposes or by Participants and Respondents for the use of our site and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line only, email addresses of employees of our customers
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor program
